name: Sesame Peanut Noodles Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: peanut butter, low sodium soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, water, brown sugar, garlic, fresh ginger, spaghetti, shredded carrot, shredded red cabbage, edamame, peanuts, black sesame seeds, scallions
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces dried spaghetti, cooked according to package instructions
recipeInstructionSteps: In a blender, combine the peanut butter, soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, water, brown sugar, garlic, and ginger and blend until smooth.
In a large bowl, add the spaghetti, carrots, cabbage, and edamame and pour over the peanut sauce. Use tongs to mix well, until sauce is fully incorporated.
Transfer to bowls and top with peanuts, black sesame seeds, and scallion.
